sentence.Network_en: Hemigrammus family of tetras comes in different colors. They are peaceful, hardy shoal fish.
sentence.Network_cn: 属于灯科鱼类的红鼻剪刀一族拥有不同的色彩. 它们是平和而强壮的群居鱼类.
